items.name: Mangrove Forests: Nature’s most beautiful wonder
items.section_title: Mangrove Forests: Nature’s most beautiful wonder
items.section_excerpt: Be charmed by the Mangrove forests that line the waterways of Poovar. Take guided tours or boat rides through such lush green ecosystems with biodiversity. Notice exotic birds, butterflies, and unique plant species flourishing in brackish water amidst the mangroves.
